page.title: 19 GETTING ABOUT
page.content: The area of Dalmilling/Whitletts is served by 2 local bus services run by {Western S.M.T.Company Ltd.}Buses run at regular intervals of 17 minutes to carry passengers to and from the town of Ayr.There are two bus termini {(a)Westwood Avenue}for the Dalmilling community {(b)James Brown Avenue}for the Whitletts community. Long distance buses also travel along the busy Whitletts Road,and carry the passengers to places such as Annbank, Tarbolton and Mauchline. { Pupils}travelling to schools outwith the district are also provided with a regular service to and from school. Similarly,those{miners,}who work at the nearby{Killoch Colliery,}are taken to the mine and collected at the end of their daily shifts.
